bank

Class OverdrawException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • bank.OverdrawException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class OverdrawException
extends Exception
    The OverdrawException is thrown when a bank transaction is called which would overdraw an account, i.e. which tries to withdraw more money from an account than its balance. This exception is declared on the methods withdraw and transfer.
    Version:
    3.0
    Author:
    Dominik Gruntz
    See Also:
    Account, Bank, Serialized Form
